item.title: Migrating Nextcloud Setup to Nixos Server
item.description: I decided to play with nixos on my infra again, specifically migrate my nextcloud setup to nixos-powered box at home. While the process of setting up nextcloud under nixos is well documented all over the interwebs, migrating already existing setup proved to be a bit more pain.

item.title: whoami
item.description: Hi, my name is oxapentane. People also call me Grigory, Greg, “эй, ты!” and many different other names and aliases. I was born in Russia over quarter of a century ago. I graduated from Moscow State University, department of Chemistry. At the moment I’m pursuing PhD in physics (by doing mostly chemistry). You can find my contact information at the bottom of the page About this blog the what This is my garage with the door open.
